Detailed Description

Member Function Documentation

- (void AutoScalingScalingPolicy.)addAlarm: (AutoScalingAlarm *)  alarm  

Adds a single object to alarms.

This function will alloc and init alarms if not already done.

- (NSString * AutoScalingScalingPolicy.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id AutoScalingScalingPolicy.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) adjustmentType [read, write, retain]

Specifies whether the ScalingAdjustment is an absolute number or a percentage of the current capacity.

Valid values are ChangeInCapacity, ExactCapacity, and PercentOfCapacity.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSString *) autoScalingGroupName [read, write, retain]

The name of the Auto Scaling group associated with this scaling policy.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSString *) policyARN [read, write, retain]

The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 1600
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSString *) policyName [read, write, retain]

The name of the scaling policy.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 255
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSNumber *) scalingAdjustment [read, write, retain]

The number associated with the specified AdjustmentType.

A positive value adds to the current capacity and a negative value removes from the current capacity.
